topic.title: New Payment
topic.shortdesc: This page describes all of the relevant parameters for the New Payment task.

body.p: Broader Context: New Payment refers the category Payment Tasks. It is a simple money transaction.
Task PID: Task's persistent identifier (unique number).
Task type : Task type is enumeration of domain_title/task_type/task_subtype.
Is a part of Roles (relationship type): what bank's employees or private roles this task is targeting at.
Is handled within workspace : this task corresponds to which department in terms of the end-user. Links to related Workspaces should be included.
Task handling UI pages : what specific UI pages correspond to this Task.

Refers to (relationship type): Each task refers to a specific workspace or several workspaces. And accordingly, can be performed within a specific widget type. This type of relationship has to be clarified in the table .

Is affecting what (relation type): Task may affect some other tasks, steps, or processes after it is performed. For example, if you delete a user, then it may require an update elsewhere. This type of affection has to clarified in the table.
